pkgmetadata.longdescription: High-Dimensional Mediation Analysis // Allows to estimate and test high-dimensional mediation effects based on advanced mediator screening and penalized regression techniques. Methods used in the package refer to Haixiang Zhang, Yinan Zheng, Zhou Zhang, Tao Gao, Brian Joyce, Grace Yoon, Wei Zhang, Joel Schwartz, Allan Just, Elena Colicino, Pantel Vokonas, Lihui Zhao, Jinchi Lv, Andrea Baccarelli, Lifang Hou, Lei Liu (2016) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btw351.
